selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To determine the positions of points M and K on sides AB and AD of the square.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image data and specify reference objects (AB, AD) and target objects (M, K) to identify their spatial relationships.

selected_skills.name: apply_circle_theorems
selected_skills.purpose: To use geometric properties of the square and the inscribed circle to determine angle ∠AMK.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Apply circle theorems using known angles and segments to calculate the desired angle.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the computed angle as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the computed angle as input to format it correctly.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_in_square_with_inscribed_circle
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate the angle ∠AMK in a square with an inscribed circle given the positions of points M and K.
edge_cases: M and K are at the same point
M and K are at the vertices of the square
